articles.title: Satellite laser ranging technique reveals 90 mm sea-level surge over past 30 years - Phys.org
articles.description: The rise in global mean sea level (GMSL) is a critical indicator of climate change. Hong Kong Polytechnic University (PolyU) researchers have utilized advanced space geodetic technologies to deliver the first precise 30-year (1993–2022) record of global ocean…
